page.title: 03LIFE STYLE
page.content: FOR HEATING THEIR HOUSES, SOME PEOPLE HAVE OPEN FIRES WHICH BURN COAL, LOGS AND PEAT. SOME HAVE CENTRAL HEATING WHICH RUNS RADIATORS; SOME HAVE RAYBURN STOVES WHICH USE SOLID FULE OR ONE THAT USES OIL. OUR WINTERS CAN BE VERY COLD SO SOME PEOPLE HAVE INSTALLED DOUBLE-GLAZING. IN THE BATHROOM YOU MAY FIND HEAT-LAMPS OVERHEAD. FOR COOKING, THE RAYBURN IS USED AND COOKERS MAY USE CALOR GAS OR ELETRICITY. WE USE ELECTRIC POWER FOR MANY THINGS - RADIO, TELEVISION, RECORD PLAYERS, CASSETTES, VACUUM CLEANERS, REFRIGERATORS, WASHING MACHINES, MIXERS, TOOLS, RADIO-ALARM CLOCKS, KETTLES, ECT. FOR LIGHTING WE MAY USE HANGING CENTRAL BULBS, FLUORESCENT LIGHTS, CONCEALED LIGHTING OR TABLE LAMPS.
